formElement.label: Ticket ID
formElement.documentation: The ID of your existing ticket

formElement.label: Comment
formElement.documentation: A comment to add to the ticket along the logs.

formElement.label: Gathering Resource
formElement.documentation: The resource to gather the logs, open ticket and upload logs.

formElement.label: Server Resources
formElement.documentation: A list of resources -comma separated- or pools to represent your server list. Change the default value for cluster mode.

formElement.label: Zendesk configuration
formElement.documentation: The name of the Zendesk configuration to use.

formElement.label: ShareFile configuration
formElement.documentation: The name of the ShareFile configuration to use.

formElement.label: ShareFile upload directory
formElement.documentation: The path to your EC-ShareFile uploads directory.

formElement.label: Agent List
formElement.documentation: The comma separated list of agents where the problem occured.

formElement.label: Time
formElement.documentation: The time at which the issue happened (if known). Format is [yyyy-mm-dd] HH:mm.

formElement.label: Job Id
formElement.documentation: The jobId in which the issue occured (if known). It is used to retrieve the correct logs.
